Customer Number: {{customer.customerNumber}}
Created On {{customer.created}}

  • {{ address.street }} {{ address.city }}

No Addresses found.

Contacts

  • {{ contact.fullName }} - {{ contact.email }}

No Contacts found.
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-customer-detail', templateUrl: './customer-details.component.html' }) export class CustomerDetailsComponent implements OnInit { customer: any; addresses: any[] = []; contacts: any[] = []; hasAddresses = false; hasContacts = false; constructor(private http: HttpClient, private route: ActivatedRoute) { } async ngOnInit() { const id = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id'); const baseUrl = "https://localhost:7245/Customers/fullinfo/"; await this.http.get(baseUrl + id) .subscribe((data: any )=> { if (Object.keys(data).includes('customer')) { this.customer = data.customer; } if (Object.keys(data).includes('addresses')) { this.addresses = data.addresses; if (data.addresses.length > 0) this.hasAddresses = true; } if (Object.keys(data).includes('contacts')) { this.contacts = data.contacts; if (data.contacts.length > 0) this.hasContacts = true; } }); } }
